```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(MultiAssayExperiment)
rdadir <- "~/Documents/maeo"
if (!file.exists(file.path(rdadir, "accMAEO.rds"))) {
   download.file("http://s3.amazonaws.com/multiassayexperiments/accMAEO.rds", 
                 destfile = file.path(rdadir, "accMAEO.rds"))
}
acc <- readRDS(file.path(rdadir, "accMAEO.rds"))
```

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(GenomicRanges)
acc
summary(isDisjoint(experiments(acc)$CNASNP))
summary(isDisjoint(experiments(acc)$CNVSNP))
summary(isDisjoint(experiments(acc)$Mutations))
```
